title: adding solar lights to our chicken coop and flight pen

tasks.task: Review and install solar lighting system for chicken house
subtasks: Examine solar lights and their components
Assess the solar panel attachment method
Consider the use of remote controls
Evaluate energy-saving settings (brightness for varying hours)
Address concerns about predator prevention with extended lighting
Plan the installation process for the solar lights
Schedule follow-up video to assess lighting system performance
Test the solar lights during nighttime to check functionality
